channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump appeals felony conviction citing Supreme Court immunity
item.description: President Trump's attorneys appealed his criminal conviction Monday, arguing the New York trial was "fatally marred" by evidence they say was protecte...

item.title: Axios interview: Joe Scarborough adds to "Morning Joe" buffet
item.description: Four hours of "Morning Joe" just isn't enough for Joe Scarborough. The MSNBC host tells Axios he's launching an early-afternoon newsletter, "The Tea, ...

item.title: We're spending more time stuck in traffic than ever
item.description: Data: Texas A&M Transportation Institute ; Note: Includes metro areas with at least 500k residents in 2024, and passengers who typically travel during...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Trump claims the power to do almost anything
item.description: President Trump is asserting the right to unilaterally use the military wherever, whenever and be the sole judge and jury of his own actions. Why it m...

item.title: Amazon will cut 14,000 corporate roles, nods to AI-driven changes
item.description: Amazon on Tuesday said it would cut 14,000 corporate roles, in an effort to thin out bureaucracy and be more flexible in an AI-driven era. Why it matt...

item.title: The story behind that surprisingly catchy Social Security hold music
item.description: This musician wrote a song nearly 20 years ago about not waiting. Hundreds of millions have heard it -- while on hold, waiting.

item.title: Citing autopen use, GOP-led House Oversight Committee calls Biden actions ‘illegitimate’
item.description: A report released Tuesday calls for further DOJ investigation into the Biden administration.

item.title: Japan’s new leader tries to charm Trump with gold, golf and deal on rare minerals
item.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and President Donald Trump inked a rare-earth minerals deal ahead of Trump’s meeting with China’s Xi Jinping.

item.title: Texas AG Paxton files Tylenol lawsuit, taking cues from Trump, Kennedy
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, a Republican seeking election to the U.S. Senate, filed suit against Tylenol’s maker and its former parent company ...

item.title: Callers to Social Security wait for hours to get help. Hear their ordeals.
item.description: Millions of seniors and disabled people call Social Security’s 1-800 number every month. What they experience is often maddening.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
